ideas.event: Centennial Art and Poetry Contest winners presentation
ideas.title: Jupiter Celebrates Young Artists and Poets
ideas.summary: The town council meeting recognized local students for their inspiring submissions in the Centennial Art and Poetry Contest, highlighting the creative expressions of what Jupiter means to them.

angles.name: Community Pride
angles.description: Focus on how the contest fosters local pride and community spirit among young residents.
angles.prompt_hint: Explore how the contest reflects community values and boosts local pride.

angles.name: Educational Impact
angles.description: Discuss the educational benefits for students participating in such creative contests.
angles.prompt_hint: Analyze educational benefits and skills students gain from participating in art and poetry contests.

angles.name: Cultural Significance
angles.description: Examine the role of contests like these in preserving and promoting local culture.
angles.prompt_hint: Highlight the contest's contribution to cultural preservation and promotion in Jupiter.

ideas.event: Anchored Vessels update and Operation Barnacle Busters
ideas.title: Jupiter Tackles Anchored Vessel Issues with Innovative Solutions
ideas.summary: The Jupiter Police Department is actively addressing the issue of anchored vessels with a new initiative called Operation Barnacle Busters, aiming to enforce vessel compliance and improve waterway management.

angles.name: Environmental Impact
angles.description: Investigate how managing derelict vessels benefits the local marine environment.
angles.prompt_hint: Focus on environmental benefits of removing or managing derelict vessels.

angles.name: Public Safety and Policy
angles.description: Discuss the implications of new policies and legislative changes on public safety and waterway management.
angles.prompt_hint: Examine how new policies enhance public safety and waterway management.

angles.name: Community Engagement
angles.description: Highlight the role of community and law enforcement collaboration in addressing the issue.
angles.prompt_hint: Explore community and law enforcement collaboration in managing anchored vessels.

ideas.event: Funding and contract approval for new water metering system
ideas.title: Jupiter Invests in Advanced Water Metering Technology
ideas.summary: The town council approved a contract for a new advanced metering infrastructure to replace the aging water metering system, expected to improve operational efficiency and accuracy.

angles.name: Fiscal Responsibility
angles.description: Analyze the financial implications and long-term savings from the new metering system.
angles.prompt_hint: Focus on financial impact and return on investment for the new metering system.

angles.name: Technological Advancement
angles.description: Explore how this technological upgrade will benefit residents and the town's operations.
angles.prompt_hint: Highlight technological benefits and improvements from the new metering system.

angles.name: Customer Service Enhancement
angles.description: Discuss how the new system will improve customer service and water usage insights for residents.
angles.prompt_hint: Examine improvements in customer service and water usage insights from the new system.
